extendedInfo.description: *** PROBLEMS UPDATING? DELETE THE APP AND RE-INSTALL, YOU WON'T LOSE ANY DATA***Fantasy iTeam 13/14 ("FiT") is back for it's 3rd season! This time with not only the EPL but also with a separate Champions League version integrated.FiT is the truly mobile, truly interactive, leading fantasy football app played by thousands of football fans around the world.Select your Fantasy iTeam from any of the 20 EPL or European Champions League squads and play against other iTeam Managers around the world. Banter with other iTeam Managers using the in-app Newsfeed and the official social channels on Facebook and Twitter.With live stats, realtime player values and the unique Player-Versus-Player H2H feature, this app will keep you playing every day for the rest of your life!The EPL season kicks off on Saturday 17th August 2013 and runs for 38 game weeks until May 2014. The first group stage of the CL kicks off week commencing 16th September 2013.There are some great prizes up for grabs too including:- World Sporting Event Tour for two people- VIP Match Day Experience for two people- Â£1000, Â£500, Â£250 and Â£100 Gadget Packs- Signed Sports Memorabilia- Official Club ShirtsNOTE: Prizes available are subject to your age and location. See in-app for full details of what prizes apply to you or contact our Support Team if you have any queries. Apple are in no way associated with any of the prizes.APP STORE REVIEWS:"If there was a list of amazing apps this would be at the top." Dr Coolieo, 4th April 2013"Incredible game highly recommended" Henez123, 9th April 2013"By far the best fantasy football app going" Kayani, 10th April 2013FiT 13/14 GAME FEATURES:Be Truly Mobile!Playing fantasy football can be difficult when you're away from your Mac or PC - Fantasy iTeam changes this by allowing you to make those important managerial decisions while on the move with your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad. Simply sign-up within the app, pick an iTeam, activate and start playing!Be An Expert!Be a fantasy football expert by selecting your Fantasy iTeam from any of the 20 EPL or European Champions League squads and within your iTeam's initial budget of Â£75m. Then decide on your FiT team name and choose a badge from a selection of carefully crafted identities.Be A Winner!There are some great prizes up for grabs including a World Sporting Event Tour for two people (worth Â£7,500), Match Day VIP experiences, gadget packs worth Â£1000, Â£500, Â£250 and Â£100, official club shirts and signed memorabilia. See in-app for full prizes info and terms that apply to you based on your location and age.Be Involved!Join a friend's Mini League or create your own, challenge other iTeams to Head-to-Head matches or complete in a Credit Comps Mini League to win FiT Credits. Then you can watch everyone's progress throughout the competition by viewing the many leagues.Be Smart!Monitor the Player DAQ index and make profits to boost your budget by reviewing player prices (which fluctuate depending on their performance and popularity) and making shrewd transfers at the right moment.Be Updated!View live scores, results and fixture details to keep track of what's happening on and off the pitch. Our feeds are updated realtime so you'll always be in touch with every development during the tournament.All trademarks and copyrights are the property of their respective owners.

reviews.title: Don\'t know yet...
reviews.comment: Just signed up to this. We\'ll see how it goes. It says sign up with Facebook but everytime I try it crashes.  So I just signed up the conventional way. Please fix
reviews.author: Ralph Parry

reviews.title: Cannot install
reviews.comment: At first it was all going smoothly. Then the app uninstalled by itself and everytime I want to install it again, it says \'Cannot be installed on device or SD Card\'
reviews.author: Amardas Singh

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: Wont allow you to share via facebook, keeps crashing.

reviews.title: Laggy
reviews.comment: Lags and crashes a lot of times, and 2 transfers per week is crap. Maybe without the lags n crashes it would be better

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Please add FiT338578 so we both get free in game currency. Thanks :)

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Makes wknd more interesting

reviews.title: Can\'t wait to get started!
reviews.comment: Seems to be just the fantasy football game I was looking for. Easy to navigate, multi platform and the mini leagues look very interesting! Roll on the 17th!

reviews.title: Laggy on Android
reviews.comment: used the app on an Apple before as an Apple user. it reli makes Android look bad. many times I faced laggy moments to load. player index graph is also not available on Android. & a useful shortlist shd be included too!
reviews.author: Muzzaffar Shah

reviews.comment: Unable to connect through FB!!!!!!

reviews.title: Anybody play this game/app from Indonesia?
reviews.comment: Its my 2nd years. Great game. Cant wait 17th August 2013 to start the game.
